Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

So a friend of mine recently introduced me to KSP. I started playing it and I liked it quite well.

I've already brought several things in orbit around the Kerbol (even a manned space lab, which was meant for Kerbin orbit )

So anyway, thanks for making this game, it even allowed me to remake the Orion Test flight

Sincerely,

AdmiralAdama

Hello, and welcome to the forums! Enjoy your stay!

And congrats on already being able to get into orbit, it seems like you're really starting to grasp the game quite well.

(And if you land on the Mun for the first time or something significant like that, take some screenshots and head over to the KSP Reddit page and show us your progress, if you wish. We love that sort of stuff!)
welcome to the forums! Good luck with your Orion programme
